code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import'./styles/Investments.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Investments=()=>{const[investments,setInvestments]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchInvestments=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/investments');setInvestments(response.data);};fetchInvestments();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"investments",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Investments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:investments.map(investment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[investment.name," - ",investment.amount," - ",investment.current_value]},investment.id))})]});};export default Investments;
